priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire PARENT-DDS Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C163395

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire PARENT-DDS Test Code Terminology

definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes test code.
name: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire PARENT-DDS Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that my teen and I just don't work well together when it comes to diabetes.
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling unappreciated for all the ways I try to help my teen manage diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Unappreciated for Ways I Help

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that I can't trust my teen to take good care of his/her diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Trust Teen Take Care of Diabetes
synonyms: DDS02-Trust Teen Take Care of Diabetes

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about my teen's low blood sugars when he/she is away from home.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Low Blood Sugars Away From Home
synonyms: DDS02-Low Blood Sugars Away From Home

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that my teen will ignore or forget diabetes if I don't keep reminding him/her.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Teen Ignore or Forget Diabetes

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that diabetes is taking up too much of my mental and physical energy every day.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Taking Too Much of My Energy
synonyms: DDS02-Taking Too Much of My Energy

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that trying to help my teen with his/her diabetes is always a battle.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Help Teen Is a Battle

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about my teen's low blood sugars when he/she is sleeping.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Low Blood Sugars When Sleeping

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that no one notices that diabetes is hard on me, not just on my teen.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - No One Notices Diabetes Hard on Me
synonyms: DDS02-No One Notices Diabetes Hard on Me

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that my teen doesn't do enough to manage his/her diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Doesn't Do Enough Manage Diabetes

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that my teen doesn't have the right doctor for him/her.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Teen Doesn't Have Right Doctor

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that others will blame me if my teen's diabetes is not well-controlled.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Blame Me If Not Well-controlled

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that my teen will soon leave home and I cannot protect him.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Leave Home and Cannot Protect Him
synonyms: DDS02-Leave Home and Cannot Protect Him

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated because my teen ignores my suggestions about diabetes.

Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated by the lack of understanding and support for diabetes I get from friends and family members.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Lack Support From Friends and Family

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that my teen doesn't get all of the expert medical help he/she needs.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Doesn't Get Expert Medical Help

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling uncertain about how to motivate my teen to take better care of his/her diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Motivate Teen Take Care Diabetes

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Concerned that my teen is not prepared to deal with the world of insurance and doctors once he/she is an adult.
terms.preferredTerm: PARENT-DDS - Teen Not Prepared Once Adult

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated that I am the only one who takes responsibility for helping my teen manage diabetes.
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that my nagging about diabetes is hurting my relationship with my teen.
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Total DDS score: Sum of 20 item scores.
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Total DDS score: Mean item score.
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Total DDS score: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Personal distress: Sum of 6 items (2, 6, 9, 12, 15, 19).
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Personal distress: Mean item score.
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Personal distress: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Teen management distress: Sum of 4 items (4, 8, 13, 18).
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Teen management distress: Mean item score.
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Teen management distress: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Parent/teen relationship distress: Sum of 8 items (1, 3, 5, 7, 10, 14, 17, 20).
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Parent/teen relationship distress: Mean item score.
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Parent/teen relationship distress: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Healthcare team distress: Sum of 2 items (11, 16).
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Healthcare team distress: Mean item score.
Diabetes Distress Scale for Parents of Teens with Type 1 Diabetes - Healthcare team distress: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
